text:
="preserve">Chuck Hulse (October 3, 1927 – July 13, 2020) was a American racecar driver. He was born in Anaheim, California. Hulse raced in the USAC Championship Car series in the 1959–1964 and 1966–1968 seasons, with 60 career starts, including the Indianapolis 500 races in 1962, 1963, 1966 and 1967.
On July 13, 2020, Hulse died, aged 93.
